page.title: 03THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: Very close to Junction 18 on the M1 Motorway on the western edge of the village of Crick there is a small Industrial Estate. Presently this site is occupied by 9 companies, 7 of which are concerned with Warehousing/ Transport/Distribution, 1 warehouse for bicycles and the last concerned with computer systems and services. The types of goods being distributed are parts for Volvo cars, household textiles, food for a major retail company - Tesco, ceramic tiles and two firms just involved in transporting any goods. The total number of people from Crick that work at the Industrial Estate is 66. These warehouses are in Crick because of the location on the M1. On the M1 we can go north, south and to the east and the west.
